name: Granny in Paradise
description:
Granny in Paradise is the second installment to the Super Granny series.
Granny in Paradise takes place in several locations including the resort and the jungle.
The story: After saving her cats from the nefarious Dr.Meow, she decides to go on a vacation with her cats. Little did she know that Dr.Meow had followed her there, planning to steal her cats again!
